# rtx_bridge (Resource)

Manages Ethernet bridge configurations on RTX routers. Bridges combine multiple interfaces into a single Layer 2 broadcast domain.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Basic bridge with LAN interfaces
resource "rtx_bridge" "internal" {
  name    = "bridge1"
  members = ["lan1", "lan2"]
}

# L2VPN bridge combining LAN and L2TPv3 tunnel interfaces
resource "rtx_bridge" "l2vpn" {
  name    = "bridge2"
  members = ["lan3", "tunnel1", "tunnel2"]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The bridge name (e.g., 'bridge1', 'bridge2'). Must be in format 'bridgeN'.

### Optional

- `members` (List of String) List of member interfaces to include in the bridge (e.g., ['lan1', 'tunnel1']). Valid formats include 'lanN', 'lanN/N' (VLAN), 'tunnelN', 'ppN', 'loopbackN'.

### Read-Only

- `interface_name` (String) The bridge interface name. Same as 'name', provided for consistency with other resources.
